name: Sen. Dianne Feinstein
address: 331 Hart Senate Office Building, Washington, DC 20510

stances.Climate Change: Supports comprehensive climate action including renewable energy initiatives and emissions reduction targets.
stances.Gun Policies: Strong advocate for gun safety measures including universal background checks and assault weapons ban.
stances.Healthcare: Supports strengthening the Affordable Care Act and reducing prescription drug costs.
stances.LGBTQ+: Long-time supporter of LGBTQ+ rights including marriage equality and anti-discrimination protections.
stances.Homelessness: Advocates for federal funding for affordable housing and mental health services.

recentBills.title: Infrastructure Investment Act
recentBills.description: Voted in favor of the $1.2 trillion infrastructure package for roads, bridges, and clean energy.

recentBills.title: Voting Rights Advancement Act
recentBills.description: Co-sponsored legislation to restore and strengthen voting rights protections.

name: Rep. Nancy Pelosi
address: 1236 Longworth House Office Building, Washington, DC 20515

stances.Climate Change: Champion of the Green New Deal and aggressive climate action policies.
stances.Gun Policies: Supports comprehensive gun safety legislation including assault weapons ban.
stances.Healthcare: Architect of the Affordable Care Act and supporter of universal healthcare.
stances.LGBTQ+: Pioneering advocate for LGBTQ+ rights and equality legislation.
stances.Homelessness: Supports federal investment in affordable housing and social services.

recentBills.title: Build Back Better Act
recentBills.description: Led House passage of comprehensive climate and social spending package.

recentBills.title: For the People Act
recentBills.description: Championed voting rights and election reform legislation.

name: London Breed
address: 1 Dr Carlton B Goodlett Pl, San Francisco, CA 94102

stances.Climate Change: Committed to carbon neutrality by 2040 and increasing renewable energy usage citywide.
stances.Gun Policies: Supports local gun safety measures while working within state and federal frameworks.
stances.Healthcare: Expanding community health programs and mental health services for vulnerable populations.
stances.LGBTQ+: Strong advocate for LGBTQ+ community and San Francisco's leadership in equality.
stances.Homelessness: Implementing comprehensive approach including housing, services, and accountability measures.

recentBills.title: Housing Bond Measure
recentBills.description: Championed $600 million housing bond to create affordable housing units.

recentBills.title: Mental Health Reform
recentBills.description: Expanded mental health and substance abuse treatment programs citywide.

name: Matt Mahan
address: 200 E Santa Clara St, San José, CA 95113

stances.Climate Change: Committed to carbon neutrality and expanding renewable energy infrastructure throughout San José.
stances.Gun Policies: Supports evidence-based gun safety measures while respecting constitutional rights.
stances.Healthcare: Advocates for accessible healthcare services and mental health resources for all residents.
stances.LGBTQ+: Strong supporter of LGBTQ+ rights and inclusive policies in city government.
stances.Homelessness: Implementing comprehensive strategy to address homelessness through housing, services, and prevention.

recentBills.title: Affordable Housing Initiative
recentBills.description: Approved new affordable housing development projects to address housing crisis.

recentBills.title: Climate Action Plan
recentBills.description: Implemented comprehensive climate action plan with emissions reduction targets.
